articles.title: AMD: Don’t Expect Custom Radeon RX 6800 XT & RX 6800 Graphics Cards At Official MSRPs Till 2021 - Wccftech
articles.description: In a statement given to Hardware Unboxed, AMD has clarified that their Radeon RX 6800 XT & RX 6800 custom partner models will be available at MSRPs in 4 to 8 weeks. This statement comes at a time when not only the partner models but also the reference mod…
